user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company and I want to create a multilingual invitation.

TaskList.description: Translate the text 'Join us for a day of team-building activities' into French using a translation API.
Translate the text 'Join us for a day of team-building activities' into Spanish using a translation API.
Translate the text 'Join us for a day of team-building activities' into German using a translation API.
Check the French translation for any profanity using a profanity filter API.
Check the Spanish translation for any profanity using a profanity filter API.
Check the German translation for any profanity using a profanity filter API.
